segments.text: Hi , I have a doctor ’ s appointment scheduled with Dr . Smith , and I need to change it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What day did you have it scheduled for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time was it scheduled for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was for two o ’ clock in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see your appointment . What day would you like to switch to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to switch it to next Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to come in at 10
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , I will pencil that in right now . We will see you then .
segments.speaker: S2
